docs.snippet: Instead of seizing the opportunity to distinguish himself with Geno Smith unavailable, Mark Sanchez finished 13 of 23 for 169 yards in an inconsistent performance....
docs.lead_paragraph: Instead of seizing the opportunity to distinguish himself with Geno Smith unavailable, Mark Sanchez finished 13 of 23 for 169 yards in an inconsistent performance.
